server/general.description: General settings related to your Stump server instance

serverInfo.description: Basic details about your Stump server instance

build.label: Build
build.description: Details about the version and build

serverPublicUrl.label: Public URL
serverPublicUrl.description: The URL that your server is accessible from outside your network, if applicable. This will enable invite links and other features

server/logs.title: Logs
server/logs.description: The logs generated by your Stump server instance

persistedLogs.title: Persisted logs
persistedLogs.description: These logs have been manually persisted to the database, typically associated with a specific job or event

table.emptySubtitle: Your server is either very healthy or very unhealthy

deleteLogs.title: Delete logs
deleteLogs.description: Permanently delete all persisted logs from the database

liveLogs.title: Live logs feed
liveLogs.description: Streamed directly from your Stump server instance in real-time

server/jobs.title: Jobs
server/jobs.description: Background jobs that run on your Stump server instance

scheduling.title: Scheduling
scheduling.description: Some jobs can be configured to run on a schedule. Changes to this configuration will take effect after a server restart

history.title: History
history.description: A record of jobs that have been run on your Stump server instance

table.emptyHeading: There are no jobs to display
table.emptySubtitle: You can't have a job if you don't have a job
table.deleteAllMessage: Job history and statistics may be deleted from the database at any time. This action cannot be undone

server/users.title: Users
server/users.description: Manage the users on this server

createUser.title: Create user
createUser.description: Create a new user on this server

updateUser.title: Update user
updateUser.description: Update the details of this user

accessControl.heading: Access control and restrictions
subtitle: Configure any restrictions you want to apply to this user. For more information about access control, see the
documentation

ageRestriction.label: Age restriction
ageRestriction.description: Restricts the user from accessing content above the set age rating threshold

enforceUnset.label: Enforce on unset
enforceUnset.description: If enabled, users will be restricted from accessing content with no age rating available

tagRestriction.label: Tag restrictions
tagRestriction.description: Restricts the user from accessing content with the selected tags

permissions.heading: Permissions
subtitle: Select the permissions you want to grant to this user. For more information on what each permission does, see the
documentation

read.label: Access book club features
read.description: Allows the user to access book club features, including viewing and joining book clubs

create.label: Create book clubs
create.description: Allows the user to create new book clubs

api_keys.label: API keys
api_keys.description: Allow the user to manage their own API keys

koreader_sync.label: KoReader sync
koreader_sync.description: Allow the user to access the KoReader sync integration

explorer.label: File Explorer
explorer.description:
Allows the user to access the Library File Explorer.
Content restriction is not supported when this feature is granted

download.label: Download files
download.description: Allows the user to download files from the server

upload.label: Upload files
upload.description: Allows the user to upload files to the server

read.label: Access emailers
read.description: Allows the user to view the configured emailers

create.label: Create emailers
create.description: Allows the user to create new emailers

manage.label: Manage emailers
manage.description: Allows the user to manage existing emailers

send.label: Send emails
send.description: Allows the user to send emails from the server to any configured aliases

arbitrary_send.label: Send arbitrary emails
arbitrary_send.description: Allows the user to send emails from the server to any email address

create.label: Create libraries
create.description:
Allows the user to create new libraries.
Includes permissions to edit and scan

scan.label: Scan libraries
scan.description: Allows the user to initiate scans for existing libraries

edit.label: Edit libraries
edit.description: Allows the user to edit basic details for existing libraries

manage.label: Manage libraries
manage.description:
Allows the user to manage advanced settings for existing libraries.
Includes permissions to edit and scan

delete.label: Delete libraries
delete.description:
Allows the user to delete existing libraries.
Includes permissions to edit, manage, and scan

manage.label: Manage server
manage.description:
Allows the user to manage the server.
Includes *many* other permissions

read.label: Read users
read.description: Allows the user to query other users on the server. This is required for some other features, e.g. excluding users from accessing a library

manage.label: Manage users
manage.description:
Allows the user to manage other users on the server.
Includes permissions to create and update

read.label: Access smart list feature
read.description: Allows the user to access smart lists features

validation.ageRestrictionTooLow: Age restriction cannot be less than 0

server/email.title: Email
server/email.description: Settings related to the configuring an SMTP emailer for your Stump server instance

emailers.title: SMTP emailers
emailers.description: The clients you have configured for sending emails from your Stump server instance
emailers.singleInstanceDisclaimer: While Stump supports multiple SMTP configurations in the backend, only one can be configured on the UI. This will be improved in the future

sendHistory.heading: Send history
sendHistory.description: A record of emails sent from this emailer
sendHistory.emptySubtitle: The history of this emailer is empty. It has either not been used or the history has been cleared

devices.title: Email devices
devices.description: The device aliases you have configured for receiving emails from your Stump server instance

name.label: Name
name.description: A friendly name to uniquely identify this device alias

email.label: Email
email.description: The email address this alias will be associated with

forbidden.label: Forbidden
forbidden.description: When enabled, no user may send emails to the address associated with this alias

table.emptySubtitle: Create a new device alias for future use

name.label: Name
name.description: A friendly name to uniquely identify this emailer

smtpSettings.heading: SMTP settings
smtpSettings.description: The SMTP-specific settings for this emailer

smtpProvider.label: SMTP provider preset
smtpProvider.description: The provider of the SMTP server. This is used to prefill some common settings, but doesn't capture all providers

smtpHost.label: SMTP host
smtpHost.description: The hostname of the SMTP server

smtpPort.label: SMTP port
smtpPort.description: The port of the SMTP server

tlsEnabled.label: TLS enabled
tlsEnabled.description: If enabled, the connection to the SMTP server will be encrypted

username.label: Username
username.description: The username for authenticating with the SMTP server. This is typically the email address

password.label: Password
password.description: The password for authenticating with the SMTP server. If you're using Gmail, you may need to generate an app-specific password

senderSettings.heading: Sender settings
senderSettings.description: The settings for the sender of the email

senderDisplayName.label: Sender display name
senderDisplayName.description: The name that will be displayed to recipients

senderEmail.label: Sender email address
senderEmail.description: The email address that will be displayed to recipients

maxAttachmentSize.label: Max attachment size
maxAttachmentSize.description: The maximum size, in bytes, that an attachment can be

createEmailer.title: Create emailer
createEmailer.description: Create a new SMTP emailer for your Stump server instance

updateEmailer.title: Update emailer
updateEmailer.description: Update the details of this SMTP emailer

noLibraries.heading: Nothing to see here
noLibraries.messagePrefix: You can't see what you don't have

message.create: Create a library to get started
message.wait: Once libraries are created, they'll be displayed here

desktop.message:
Произошла сетевая ошибка, предполагающая что ваш сервер в настоящее время недоступен. Пожалуйста, убедитесь, что он запущен и доступен с этого устройства.
Если ваш URL сервера изменился, вы можете обновить его, используя форму ниже

web.message: Произошла сетевая ошибка, предполагающая что ваш сервер в настоящее время недоступен. Пожалуйста, убедитесь, что он запущен и доступен с этого устройства

uploadImage.emptyState: A preview of your image will appear here
uploadImage.prompt: Drop image here or click to select

common.unimplemented: This functionality is not yet implemented! Check back later
common.limitedFunctionality: This is not yet fully implemented and is lacking some features. Check back later
